Accordion Example

Note: The data-parent attribute makes sure that all collapsible elements under the specified parent will be closed when one of the collapsible item is shown.

For Example:

id="collapseOne" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion"

id="collapseTwo" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion"

id="collapseThree" class="collapse" data-parent="#accordion"
